value.0: Celestial, abyssal and infernal runes line each digit of these jet black gloves, and it doesn't take long to reveal that these are no mere decorations - performing certain hand gestures will light up each rune of a certain language in turn, and when all runes of the same language are glowing brightly, a creature of the matching kind will be pulled from its home to do the wearer's bidding. While they've since lost their name, they were a common sight on a Red Wizard who had a flair for the dramatic, regularly summoning servants to assist in studies via complicated, impressive displays of the theatrical. It was said each rune had a small enchantment to store memories, and with the sheer amount of runes on these gloves, they promise to impart a large collection of knowledge upon any who wears them.

Celestial, abyssal and infernal runes line each digit of these jet black gloves, and it doesn't take long to reveal that these are no mere decorations - performing certain hand gestures will light up each rune of a certain language in turn, and when all runes of the same language are glowing brightly, a creature of the matching kind will be pulled from its home to do the wearer's bidding. While they've since lost their name, they were a common sight on a Red Wizard who had a flair for the dramatic, regularly summoning servants to assist in studies via complicated, impressive displays of the theatrical. It was said each rune had a small enchantment to store memories, and with the sheer amount of runes on these gloves, they promise to impart a large collection of knowledge upon any who wears them.
